users.name: David Miranda
users.description: I'm a software developer and I love playing video games.

users.name: Esteban Trujillo
users.description: I'm a game enthusiast and love reviewing games.

users.name: Alejandro Guerra
users.description: I'm a passionate gamer who loves exploring new worlds and sharing my experiences.

videogames.title: Grand Theft Auto V
videogames.subtitle: Crimen, caos y libertad sin límites
videogames.description: Grand Theft Auto V es un videojuego de acción-aventura de mundo abierto desarrollado por Rockstar North y distribuido por Rockstar Games. Este título revolucionario hizo su debut el 17 de septiembre de 2013 en las consolas Xbox 360 y PlayStation 3

videogames.title: Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered
videogames.subtitle: libertad sin límites
videogames.description: In Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered, the worlds of Peter Parker and Spider-Man collide in an original action-packed story. Play as an experienced Peter Parker, fighting big crime and iconic villains in Marvel’s New York. Web-swing through vibrant neighborhoods and defeat villains with epic takedowns.

videogames.title: God of War Ragnarök
videogames.subtitle: Caos y una gran historia
videogames.description: Kratos and Atreus embark on a mythic journey for answers before Ragnarök arrives – now on PC.

videogames.title: Assassin's Creed Odyssey
videogames.subtitle: Caos y libertad sin límites
videogames.description: Assassin's Creed Odyssey is an action-adventure game where you choose the hero you want to become. Embark on an epic journey from outcast to living legend to uncover the secrets of your past and change the fate of Ancient Greece. Fight in visceral battles on both land and sea to become a true hero

videogames.title: Marvel's Spider-Man 2
videogames.subtitle: libertad sin límites
videogames.description: Be Greater. Together. The incredible power of the symbiote forces Peter Parker and Miles Morales into a desperate fight as they balance their lives, friendships, and their duty to protect in an exciting chapter of the critically acclaimed Spider-Man franchise on PC.

videogames.title: Far Cry 6
videogames.subtitle: Supervivencia y libertad sin límites
videogames.description: Enter the adrenaline-filled world of a modern-day guerrilla revolution. With stunning vistas, visceral gunplay, and a huge variety of gameplay experiences, there's never been a better time to join the fight.

videogames.title: The Forest
videogames.subtitle: Supervivencia y libertad sin límites
videogames.description: As the lone survivor of a passenger jet crash, you find yourself in a mysterious forest battling to stay alive against a society of cannibalistic mutants. Build, explore, survive in this terrifying first person survival horror simulator.

videogames.title: Minecraft
videogames.subtitle: Supervivencia y libertad sin límites
videogames.description: Minecraft es un videojuego de mundo abierto donde la exploración y las construcciones son fundamentales. Creado por Markus <<Notch>> Persson, nos permite desarrollar nuestros propios universos fantásticos y artísticos, mediante la colocación y destrucción de bloques.

videogames.title: Terraria
videogames.subtitle: Supervivencia y libertad sin límites
videogames.description: Dig, fight, explore, build! Nothing is impossible in this action-packed adventure game. Four Pack also available!

videogames.title: ARK: Survival Evolved
videogames.subtitle: Supervivencia y libertad sin límites
videogames.description: Stranded on the shores of a mysterious island, you must learn to survive. Use your cunning to kill or tame the primeval creatures roaming the land, and encounter other players to survive, dominate... and escape!

videogames.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops III
videogames.subtitle: Disparos y estrategias
videogames.description: Call of Duty®: Black Ops III Zombies Chronicles Edition includes the full base game plus the Zombies Chronicles content expansion.

videogames.title: Counter-Strike 2
videogames.subtitle: Disparos y estrategias
videogames.description: For over two decades, Counter-Strike has offered an elite competitive experience, one shaped by millions of players from across the globe. And now the next chapter in the CS story is about to begin. This is Counter-Strike 2.

videogames.title: Apex Legends
videogames.subtitle: Disparos y estrategias
videogames.description: Apex Legends is the award-winning, free-to-play Hero Shooter from Respawn Entertainment. Master an ever-growing roster of legendary characters with powerful abilities, and experience strategic squad play and innovative gameplay in the next evolution of Hero Shooter and Battle Royale.

videogames.title: Battlefield™ V
videogames.subtitle: Disparos y estrategias
videogames.description: This is the ultimate Battlefield V experience. Enter mankind’s greatest conflict with the complete arsenal of weapons, vehicles, and gadgets plus the best customization content of Year 1 and 2.

videogames.title: Krunker
videogames.subtitle: Disparos y estrategias
videogames.description: An easy to get into fully moddable First Person Shooter with advanced movement mechanics. Fully Customizable with Mods, Custom Maps and Thousands of Items to Unlock.

videogames.title: EA SPORTS FC 25
videogames.subtitle: Deportes y estrategias
videogames.description: EA SPORTS FC™ 25 gives you more ways to win for the club. Team up with friends in your favourite modes with the new 5v5 Rush, and manage your club to victory as FC IQ delivers more tactical control than ever before.

videogames.title: NBA 2K25
videogames.subtitle: Deportes y estrategias
videogames.description: Command every court with authenticity and realism Powered by ProPLAY™, giving you ultimate control over how you play in NBA 2K25. Define your legacy in MyCAREER, MyTEAM, MyNBA, and The W.

videogames.title: Golf With Your Friends
videogames.subtitle: Deportes y estrategias
videogames.description: Why have friends if not to play Golf... With Your Friends! Nothing is out of bounds as you take on courses filled with fast paced, exciting, simultaneous mini golf for up to 12 players!

videogames.title: Steep
videogames.subtitle: Deportes y estrategias
videogames.description: Ride a massive open world across the Alps, where the powder is always fresh and the run never ends. Defy and master the mountain alone or with friends on skis, wingsuits, snowboards and paragliders. Record and share your best stunts.

videogames.title: Riders Republic
videogames.subtitle: Deportes y estrategias
videogames.description: Jump into a massive multiplayer playground! Bike, ski, snowboard, or wingsuit across an open world sports paradise.

comments.content: La mejor experiencia de mundo abierto.
La mecánica de combate es fluida.
Los trajes y habilidades son geniales.
La mejor entrega de la saga.
Historia muy emotiva y combates épicos.
Siempre se puede hacer algo nuevo.
Pixel art hermoso y gran jugabilidad.
Realismo y autenticidad en cada partido.
